definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: They had dressed his varicose ulcer with soothing ointment.
sentences.chinese: 他們在靜脈曲張的瘡口上抹了清涼的油膏。

sentences.english: Depth measure is important for determining wound volume.
sentences.chinese: 深度測量對決定瘡口容積很重要。
